title: Kiss Person Man No Skin Tone Medium Light Skin Tone

adjectives: Romantic gestures are often tender and loving.
verbs: Couples often kiss to show their deep affection.

description: A couple, a man and a woman, kissing. Often used to express love, romance, or affection between partners.
apple_vendor_description: The kissing man emoji on Apple devices presents a distinguished profile with a gentle blush across its cheeks, rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting. Its slightly closed eyes and softly pursed lips convey a tender, affectionate sentiment, characteristic of Apple's warm and expressive emoji designs. This emoji on Apple devices is perfect for conveying romantic feelings, close friendships, or a gentle peck.
